db-query-optimization.title: Database Query Optimization Challenge
db-query-optimization.description: Large-scale analytics and OLTP systems often encounter SQL queries that become prohibitively slow as data volume grows (100M+ rows). This challenge simulates a real-world scenario where you must optimize a slow SQL workload to run efficiently on a single machine.
db-query-optimization.domain: Databases, query optimization, systems engineering, data engineering

constraints.dataset: events table ~100M rows; other tables up to ~120M rows
